(:action create ; Create a structure or perform a transformation
  :parameters (?npc - entity ?location - place ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and 
                  (at ?npc ?location)
                  (available ?resource)
                  (not (structure_exists ?location))
                  (can_perform ?npc))
  :effect (and 
            (structure_exists ?location)
            (not (available ?resource))

(:action get ; Get a resource and update possession status
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?source - location ?resource - item)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?actor ?source)
                    (contains ?source ?resource)
                    (accessible ?resource))
    :effect (and
              (have ?actor ?resource)
              (not (contains ?source ?resource))

(:action transform
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - object ?location - location ?state1 - state ?state2 - state ?container - container)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (state1 ?entity)
                    (or (not (holding ?agent ?entity)) (holding ?agent ?entity)))
    :effect (and
              (not (state1 ?entity))

(:action put ; Put an item into a container or create a shelter
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - place ?container - container)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (holding ?agent ?item)
                    (or
                        (and (not (in ?item ?container)))
                        (and (available ?item) (not (shelter_exists ?location)))
                    ))
    :effect (and
              (or
                (and (in ?item ?container) (not (holding ?agent ?item))
